InstalledItem.Name: VariPuck S5 Gimbal Mount
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Flashfire Systems
Item Type: Weapon Mount
Size: 5

The VariPuck fits between your weapon and the ship hardpoint to transform a fixed weapon mount into a gimballed mount, allowing the pilot to independently aim their weaponâ€™s fire. VariPucks will accept any weapon one size smaller than the hardpoint it is mounting to.

InstalledItem.Name: Deadbolt IV Cannon
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Esperia
Item Type: Ballistic Cannon 
Size: 4

Spread dread with the Deadbolt IV ballistic cannon. Feared for its firepower at short range, this notorious Tevarin weapon earned its intimidating reputation during the First Tevarin War as part of the Tevarin fleet's devastating arsenal. Esperia has painstakingly recreated the Deadbolt IV out of respect to the original weapon and warriors who used it so effectively.

InstalledItem.Name: Esperia Prowler Turret
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Turret
Manufacturer: Esperia

This faithful recreation of the original Tevarin design features modern mounts for precise target acquisition.

InstalledItem.Name: Lightstrike III Cannon
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Esperia
Item Type: Laser Cannon 
Size: 3

The Lightstrike III takes the attack to distant targets by delivering focused, high damage blasts that will make any aggressor think twice before coming too close. Capable of providing powerful overwatch options during troop deployments or engaging targets in outer space, it's easy to see why the Lightstrike III was feared by UPE forces during the First Tevarin War.

InstalledItem.Name: Sukoran
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Shield Generator
Manufacturer: Banu
Size: 2
Grade: C
Class: Military

Good design always survives with the Banu. The Sukoran shield generator updates Tevarin technology in a number of interesting ways. Its efficient design draws less power, while still effectively producing a robust shield capable of absorbing most ballistic and energy attacks until it's fully depleted. However, this greater efficiency comes with a price as the Sukoran's slower regen rate may temporarily render the shield offline.

InstalledItem.Name: Eclipse
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Power Plant
Manufacturer: Tyler Design & Tech
Size: 2
Grade: A
Class: Stealth 

Competing medium power plants struggle to match the heat and signature reduction of the Eclipse. Tyler Design & Techâ€™s mastery of stealth tech makes this component a must own by those who prefer to go unnoticed.

InstalledItem.Name: HeatSink
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Cooler
Manufacturer: Tyler Design & Tech
Size: 2
Grade: C
Class: Stealth

The HeatSink produces low signatures without sacrificing too much performance or durability, making it a reliable stealth component.
